DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare efficacy and adverse effects of pulsed dye laser and intense pulsed light in patients with skin telangiectasia and redness.
DOC.brief_title: Pulsed Dye Laser and Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) for the Treatment of Telangiectasia and Skin Redness
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Skin types I, II, III No previous laser or IPL treatment for the condition Younger than 18 years old Skin types IV, V, or VI Pregnant or lactating women Previous laser or IPL treatment for the condition Recent exposure to sun or sunbeds Treatment with oral retinoid within 6 months Tendency to produce hypertrophic scars or keloids
